import React from 'react'; import maleLeagueImg from '../../images/male.png'; import iconFound from '../../icons/found.png'; import iconFlag from '../../icons/flag.png'; import iconFootball from '../../icons/football.png'; import iconGender from '../../icons/male-gender-sign 1.png'; import { FaGlobe, FaTwitter, FaYoutube } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './LeagueDetailsCard.css'; const LeagueDetailsCard = (props) => { const league = props.league; console.log(league); return (

{league.strLeague}

Founded: {league.intFormedYear}

Country: {league.strCountry}

Sports Type: {league.strSport}

Gender: {league.strGender}

{league.strDescriptionEN}

{league.strDescriptionFR}

); }; export default LeagueDetailsCard;
